message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $13,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice,  I appreciate your offer but $13,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. It's a fair price considering its value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Alice, $11,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $9,000.  That's a fair compromise and shows I'm serious about buying this product.
